quotes.quote: Let him not vow to walk in the dark, who has not seen the nightfall.
quotes.author: Elrond

quotes.quote: It’s the job that’s never started as takes longest to finish.
quotes.author: Sam Gamgee

quotes.quote: You see, in their last moments people show you who they really are.
quotes.author: The Dark Knight

quotes.quote: I just hope my death makes more cents than my life.
quotes.author: Joker

quotes.quote: What do you want most in the world?
quotes.author: Anna

quotes.quote: Secrecy is security and security is victory.
quotes.author: Snowden
